trans-unit.source: Maintains the run-time state of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline" /> and processes its output values.
trans-unit.target: 维护 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline" /> 的运行时状态并处理其输出值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> describes an animation's output values, duration, begin time, end time, and other fundamental animation information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>描述动画的输出值，持续时间，开始时间、 结束时间以及其他基本的动画信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> processes the animation values described by an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> object.
The animation that describes this clock's output values and timing behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 用来描述此时钟的输出值和计时行为的动画。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The origin value provided to the clock if its animation does not have its own start value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时钟的动画没有自己的起始值，则为提供给时钟的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If this clock is the first in a composition chain it will be the base value of the property being animated; otherwise it will be the value returned by the previous clock in the chain
trans-unit.target: 如果此时钟是组合链中的第一个时钟，则它将是正在进行动画处理的属性的基值；否则，它将是该组合链中的前一个时钟返回的值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value provided to the clock if its animation does not have its own destination value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时钟的动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给时钟的目标值。

trans-unit.source: If this clock is the first in a composition chain it will be the base value of the property being animated; otherwise it will be the value returned by the previous clock in the chain
trans-unit.target: 如果此时钟是组合链中的第一个时钟，则它将是正在进行动画处理的属性的基值；否则，它将是该组合链中的前一个时钟返回的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current output value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> 的当前输出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline" /> that describes this clock's behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述此时钟的行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline" />。

trans-unit.source: The animation that describes this clock's behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用来描述此时钟的行为的动画。
